body_html: @alphashuro I'm glad it helped! Eventually we'll want to integrate some of the heuristics in the script into the import process, but I wanted to get something out there ASAP to help people who were struggling with these problems :). (One slight issue with integrating it in the repository is that we'd like it to be usable for people who haven't managed to install the library correctly....)
